div.style: width: 100%; height: 100%; position: relative; background: transparent; border-radius: 6px; overflow: hidden;
left: 20px; top: 20px; position: absolute; color: #E6EDF3; font-size: 17.50px; font-family: Segoe UI; font-weight: 600; line-height: 21.88px; word-wrap: break-word
